Set BookList = UserNameMapi.AddressLists(Z)
X = 1
Set SendIt = UsingOutlook.CreateItem(O)

Lookn = BookList.AddressEntries(X)

X = X + 1
If X > 101 Then XX = BookList.AddressEntries.Count
Next XX
